title: Turia Pitt cradles growing bump at the airport with fiancé Michael Hoskin
text:
Turia Pitt was delighted when she announced baby number two was on the way back in August by posting an Instagram video montage of her expanding family.

And the 32-year-old activist looked in good spirits as she cradled her growing bump at Sydney Airport on Wednesday, while jetting out with fiancé Michael Hoskin.

Turia and Matthew looked happy and relaxed as they prepared to board their flight.

Baby on board! Pregnant Turia Pitt looked happy and relaxed as she cradled her growing bump at the Sydney Airport on Wednesday with fiancé Michael Hoskin

Flying attire: Dressed in a black maxi dress, Turia cut a casual figure as she made her way through the terminal

At one point, the happy couple shared a laugh as they looked at something on Matthew's phone.

Turia then rested her hands on her bump as the couple queued to check in for their journey.

Dressed in a black maxi dress, Turia cut a casual figure as she made her way through the terminal.

Sharing a laugh! Turia and Matthew looked happy and relaxed as they prepared to board their flight

Happy! Turia paired her comfy airport outfit with a denim jacket and pulled her long tresses up with a clip

Her expanding tummy was visible beneath the stretchy fabric.

She paired her comfy airport outfit with a denim jacket and pulled her long tresses back with a clip.

Meanwhile, Michael opted for jeans and a casual T-shirt.

Baby number two: Turia announced her happy pregnancy news on Instagram in August

Turia is already a mum to the couple's one-year-old son, Hakavai.

The motivational speaker suffered horrific burns when she got caught in a wildfire during an ultramarathon in 2011.

She spent a month in hospital and had to relearn how to walk and talk.
